quote: Many a man has failed because he had his wishbone where his backbone should have been. – Ronald Reagan
fact: Arnold Schonberg suffered from triskaidecaphobia, the fear of the number 13.  He died at 13 minutes from midnight on Friday the 13th.
joke: I knew i shouldn’t have ate that seafood. Because now i’m feeling a little… Eel
